author: Retro Game Corps
description:
I recently went on travel and the AYN Thor was the only handheld I brought with me.  Let's discuss the experience!

Buy one here: https://tinyurl.com/ThorRGC

Review video: https://youtu.be/DeGFRB0Mor8
Impressions video: https://youtu.be/B2sUrakqWt0
Dual screen handheld starter guide: https://youtu.be/SQ5xUqXgON8
KONKR Pocket Fit review: https://youtu.be/rw22H2bk0oc

Fjallraven 28L backpack: https://amzn.to/48E30dU
Genki energy pack: https://www.genkithings.com/products/energy-pack
8-inch charging cable: https://amzn.to/3XESy0A
UGREEN battery: https://amzn.to/4ptm2e4
